title: ProMariner Prosport 8 Gen 3 Heavy Duty On-Board Marine Battery Charger - 8 Amp - 2 Bank
features: Heavy-duty marine battery charger: The ProMariner Prosport 8 Gen 3 is a rugged and high-performance on-board battery charger designed for marine applications.
8 Amp charging power: The charger provides 8 Amps of charging power, allowing for efficient and quick charging of your boat batteries.
2-bank charging: With a 2-bank configuration, the charger can simultaneously charge two batteries, ensuring you have a reliable power source on your boat.

Advanced technology: The Prosport 8 Gen 3 charger utilizes advanced technology to deliver a comprehensive and safe charging experience, including built-in safety features to protect against overcharging, short circuits, and reverse polarity.
Easy installation and operation: The charger is designed for easy installation and user-friendly operation, making it convenient for boaters of all levels of expertise.
description: ProSportHD Generation 4 boasts a tri-surface heatsink design. This heavy-duty lightweight design delivers significantly faster charging through optimal cooling, while delivering true rated amp output during charge mode. ProSportHD's enhanced microprocessor and software provides digital features including: fuel gauge style Charge Completion Monitor, Charge Mode, individual Fault indicators and three digitally selectable performance charge profiles for Flooded (lead acid), AGM and GEL batteries. HP AGM profile on ProSportHD 20 Dual only. Fully automatic 5-stage charging enhances battery performance while extending battery life. System Check OK and Battery Status indicators provide real time installation and battery fault status. Designed for use in harsh environments with our industrial grade jacketed DC and AC power cables which include molded strain reliefs and wire splitters.
